Name: Animals Memory
About the game: Animals Memory - is a card game that tests your memory. The objective of the game is to match cards with the same card picture. Features: - Different levels of difficulty. From simple to complex. - Colorful images images, easy to remember. - 30 cards with pictures of animals. - It develops memory and is suitable for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults. - 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to large and complex levels.
